issue.title: [Java] Support parallel vector element search with user-specified comparator
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-11999](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11999). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
This is in response to the discussion in https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/5631#discussion_r339110228

Currently, we only support parallel search with `RangeEqualsVisitor`, which does not support user-specified comparators.
We want to provide the functionality in this issue to support wider range of use cases.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11999?focusedCommentId=17322589) by Micah Kornfield (emkornfield):*
Issue resolved by pull request 9736
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/9736>
